channel.title: EPI on Mengoreo
channel.description: Recent content in EPI on Mengoreo

item.title: Strings
item.description: You should know how strings are represented in memory and understand basic operations on strings such as comparison, copying, joining, splitting, matching, etc. Advanced string processing algorithm often use hash tables and dynamic programming.

item.title: Arrays
item.description:
Libraries

Arrays are provided in Python by list type. ( tuple is similar to list, but immutable.);

  • Checking if a value in an array has \(O(n)\) time complexity.
  • To understand how copy works check here.

item.title: Primitive Types
item.description: Be very comfortable with bitwise operators, particularly XOR. Understand how to use masks and create them in an machine independent way Know how fast ways to clear the lowermost set bit (and by extension, set the lowermost 0, get its index, etc.) Understand signedness and its implications to shifting Consider using a cache to accelerate operations by using it to brute-force small inputs Be aware that commutativity and associativity can be used to perform operations in parallel and reorder operations.
